Aroma Discord

Scent technology community

We are a slow-growing online community interested in scent and technology.

We learn together by

  • Collaboratively learning and creating in group projects.
  • Discussions on our online chat forum and virtual meet-ups.
  • Presenting topics in scent & tech through our Speaker Series.

Topics

  • Scent & VR|XR|AR
  • Art & experiences
  • Scent-sensing and related technologies
  • Design and accessibility considerations
  • Emerging technology
  • Data
  • Sign up
  • About Aroma Discord
  • Event Calendar
  • What is Discord? How do I use it?
  • Community Values & Guidelines
